string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: 2. What did Andy find on his desk?
3. Why Andy want to show his friends the magic pen?
4. What happened to the glowing pen?
5. What lesson did Andy learn from the experience?
Ande Ande Lumut was a prince who was looking for a wife.
Kleting Kuning was kind and hardworking.
The three sisters were always nice to Kleting Kuning.
Yuyu Kangkang was a magical crab that helped the sisters without asking for anything.
The three sisters arrived first and married Ande Ande Lumut.
Which expression is used to make an offer?
Why dont we go to the library? is an example of
To politely refuse an offer, we can say
A: I failed my English test. B: ________________.
Which one is NOT an expression of suggestion?
When he drew a cat, the cat suddenly jumped off the paper and ran around the room! Andy was shocked but . He drew a delicious cake, and it appeared too.
He wanted to show his friends, but the pen suddenly stopped glowing. Everything he had created into the air.
Andy learned that magic doesnt last forever, but his creativity will always stay with him. He realized that true talent comes from passion and , not from something instant like magic.
So, he kept with his heart every day and slowly, people finally noticed and admired his unique talent.
